title: Fish and Chips
description: Fish and Chips - Kenji López-Alt tested
steps: Cut potatoes into ½-inch fries. Soak in cold water 1 hour.
Heat oil to 325°F. Drain and dry potatoes. Fry 5 minutes until pale. Drain.
Increase oil to 375°F. Fry potatoes again until golden, 3-5 minutes. Season.
Whisk 1 cup flour, cornstarch, baking powder, 1 tsp salt. Whisk in beer.
Cut fish into strips. Dredge in remaining flour.
Dip in batter. Fry until golden, 4-5 minutes. Drain, season.
Serve with malt vinegar and tartar sauce.
